Meaning of Life: Is for you to find your own meaning while letting others find their own or even better guide others to their own meaning.

Meaning of life:

Unnecessary censorship! ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

> 
> Meaning of life: Salami

Must quote absolutely!
Forty two.

There is no meaning... we experience it and then we die. The memories we leave behind die with every generation after. This is something that is too difficult to put into words. If only I could share my thoughts directly... but I'll try.

You eat food, live your life, then die. That food is gone forever. When you died, all of it is in vain. Any marks you left will eventually be forgotten. Sure, we may one day become warp capable, and go out to the ends of the galaxy, but to what avail? Ultimately, does it serve a purpose?

Not really, if you think about it.

It is 9:11, and I had no sleep. It is too early.

EDIT: Thanks, clock. Makin' me a liar... 9:12
To ask questions like this.

Great, someone agrees with me!

I believe that the meaning of life is to survive.

"I always thought there was something fundamentally wrong with the universe."

And to that end, a friend and I tried to figure it out in High School long ago. Turns out the answer is applicable in Base 13 mathematics.
Meaning of life is eating pi rad of a big pizza on pi day!! (true story!!)
